amendment.description: Amendment increases funds for the Office of Inspector General at the Department of Education by $4 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 70 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase funding for the Office of Inspector General at the Department of Education by $4 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendment (A066) Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 187 (Roll no. 315).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendment (A066) Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 187 (Roll no. 315).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A066) offered by Mr. Levin (MI).
